Abyssal Firestorm Surge (7-8).hazarddescription: High winds and forest fires intensified by Abyssal energy batters everything in the surge's path。

Abyssal Plague.name: Abyssal Plague
Abyssal Plague.description:
Level 7

A creeping malaise overcomes the afflicted, whose skin develops a sickly pallor.

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:25|name:Resist Abyssal Plague]

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 day)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3} (1 day)

The target can't recover from the drained condition from Abyssal plague until the disease is cured.

Surge.name: Surge
Surge.description:
The storm of wind and fire suddenly surges over everyone in the area. When this hazard activates, roll [[/r 1d10]] to determine the effect and type of damage.

  • 1-2 Firestorm Embers and burning debris gets whipped around as the wind suddenly shifts direction, dealing @Damage[1d10[bludgeoning],(1d10+13)[fire]]{1d10 bludgeoning damage and 1d10+13 fire damage} (@Check[reflex|dc:25|basic|name:Avoid Firestorm] save).
  • 3-4 Battering Debris Wreckage rains down throughout the area, dealing @Damage[(2d10+13)[bludgeoning]] damage (@Check[fortitude|dc:25|basic|name:Avoid Battering Debris] save).
  • 5-6 Abyssal Energy The storm blows about debris that has absorbed Abyssal energies. Creatures who come into contact with this debris are exposed to Abyssal plague.
  • 7-8 Sharp Rain The storm picks up various objects, some of which are particularly sharp. The storm deals @Damage[1d10[bludgeoning],(1d10+13)[piercing]]{1d10 bludgeoning damage and 1d10+13 piercing damage} (@Check[reflex|dc:25|basic|name:Avoid Sharp Rain] save).
  • 9-10 Soot Storm Large amounts of soot blow in on the wind. The soot moves with supernatural malice, seeking out the lungs of any creatures caught nearby. Any creature that needs to breathe must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:25|name:Avoid Soot Storm|traits:inhaled] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (sickened 2 on a critical failure). The sickened condition can't end or be reduced until a creature has spent 10 minutes breathing clean air.

Abyssal Firestorm Surge (9-10).disable: @Check[arcana|dc:33|name:Redirect the Storm Surge|traits:rare,fire,environmental,hazard,magical], @Check[nature|dc:33|name:Redirect the Storm Surge|traits:rare,fire,environmental,hazard,magical], @Check[occultism|dc:33|name:Redirect the Storm Surge|traits:rare,fire,environmental,hazard,magical], or @Check[religion|dc:33|name:Redirect the Storm Surge|traits:rare,fire,environmental,hazard,magical] (受训) to redirect the storm surge or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (5th level, counteract DC 26) to nullify it。

Spore Burst.name: Spore Burst
Spore Burst.description: When an abyssal fungus dies, it triggers its Spore Cloud ability immediately.

Spores.description: A creature that takes damage from an abyssal fungus' ranged spore pod Strike must attempt a saving throw with the same DC and effect as its Spore Cloud ability
Spores.name: Spores

Spore Cloud.name: Spore Cloud
Spore Cloud.description:
An abyssal fungus can unleash a cloud of spores that irritates the eyes and throats of non-fungi creatures in a @Template[emanation|distance:15]. Each creature must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:14|options:area-effect,damaging-effect] save or take @Damage[1d4[persistent,poison]|options:area-damage].

A creature has its vision reduced as long as the persistent damage continues and can see only within 20 feet (10 feet on a critical failure).

Construct Armor (Hardness 3).name: Construct Armor (Hardness 3)
Construct Armor (Hardness 3).description:
Like normal objects, the anatomical model has Hardness. This Hardness reduces any damage the model takes by an amount equal to the Hardness.

Once an anatomical model is reduced to fewer than half its Hit Points, or immediately upon being damaged by a critical hit, its construct armor breaks, removing the Hardness and reducing its Armor Class to 13.

Slimy Guts.name: Slimy Guts
Slimy Guts.description: A creature hit by the anatomical model's guts attack is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until it takes an action to remove the guts. A creature critically hit by the anatomical model's guts attack is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes}.

Construct Armor (Hardness 5).name: Construct Armor (Hardness 5)
Construct Armor (Hardness 5).description:
Like normal objects, the anatomical model has Hardness. This Hardness reduces any damage the model takes by an amount equal to the Hardness.

Once an anatomical model is reduced to fewer than half its Hit Points, or immediately upon being damaged by a critical hit, its construct armor breaks, removing the Hardness and reducing its Armor Class to 17.

Slimy Guts.name: Slimy Guts
Slimy Guts.description: A creature hit by the anatomical model's guts attack is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until it takes an action to remove the guts. A creature critically hit by the anatomical model's guts attack is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes}.

Ancient Ooze Pit.name: Ancient Ooze Pit
Ancient Ooze Pit.hazarddescription: A trap door covers a pit that is 10 feet square and 10 feet deep. An acidic mass that was once a gelatinous cube lies at the bottom。
Ancient Ooze Pit.reset: Creatures can still fall into the trap, but the trapdoor must be reset manually for the trap to become hidden again. The remains of the burst ooze seep into the ground, and the trap functions as a normal @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.hazards.BHq5wpQU8hQEke8D]{Hidden Pit}。

Pitfall.name: Pitfall
Pitfall.description:
Trigger A creature walks onto the trapdoor

Effect The triggering creature falls in and takes @Damage[5[bludgeoning]|options:fall-damage] damage as the acidic mass breaks their fall, then @Damage[1d6[acid]] damage as the ooze bursts from the impact. That creature can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3yoajuKjwHZ9ApUY]{Grab an Edge} reaction to avoid falling.

Guardian Construct Armor (Hardness 3).name: 守卫构装装甲 Guardian Construct Armor (硬度3)
Guardian Construct Armor (Hardness 3).description:
和普通物品一样，活化守卫具有硬度。这种硬度可以减少与硬度相等的伤害。

一旦一个活化守卫的HP降低到一半以下，或者受到重击，其护甲立即被损坏，AC也会降低到11。它同时失去硬度。

Animated Guardian Warrior.name: 活化战士 Animated Guardian Warrior

Eluding Strike.name: Eluding Strike
Eluding Strike.description:
Trigger A creature targets Archis with a melee attack and Archis can see the attacker

Effect Archis dodges out of the way, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, Archis makes a melee Strike against that creature.

This Strike doesn't count toward Archis' multiple attack penalty, and his multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: Archis Peers deals 1d6 extra precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

Eluding Strike.name: Eluding Strike
Eluding Strike.description:
Trigger A creature targets Archis with a melee attack and Archis can see the attacker

Effect Archis dodges out of the way, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, Archis makes a melee Strike against that creature.

This Strike doesn't count toward Archis' multiple attack penalty, and his multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: Archis deals 1d6 extra precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

Hawk's Eye.name: Hawk's Eye
Hawk's Eye.description: When fighting outdoors, or wherever her hawk can fly, Raike ignores the effects of lesser or standard cover for her foes.

Motivating Assault.name: Motivating Assault
Motivating Assault.description:
Frequency once per round

Effect Raike makes a Strike with her axe. If the attack is successful all allies within 30 feet gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves against fear effects for 1 round.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.XH49blfNDjkqnH5N]{Effect: Motivating Assault}

Aspis Ambush.name: Aspis Ambush
Aspis Ambush.description: Raike can always use Deception or Diplomacy in place of other skills when determining Initiative.

Aspis Ambush.name: Aspis Ambush

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.XH49blfNDjkqnH5N]{Effect: Motivating Assault}

Hunt Prey.name: Hunt Prey
Hunt Prey.description:
The ash archer designates a single creature they can see and hear, or one they're Tracking, as their prey. The archer gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} the prey and to Survival checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} the prey.

The first time the archer hits the designated prey in a round, they deal an additional 1d8 precision damage. The archer also ignores the penalty for making ranged attacks within their second range increment.

These effects last until the archer uses Hunt Prey again.

Ash Form.name: Ash Form
Ash Form.description:
The ash skeleton crumbles to ash or reforms in a standing position. While ash, the ash skeleton is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobile}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard}, and has an automatic result of 26 on Deception checks and DCs to pass as an inanimate pile of ash or layer of soot.

The ash skeleton can remain in this ash form indefinitely.

Crumble.name: Crumble
Crumble.description:
Trigger The ash skeleton is critically hit

Effect The ash skeleton crumbles to ash, and the attack deals only normal damage

Crumble.name: Crumble
Crumble.description:
Trigger The ash skeleton is critically hit

Effect The ash skeleton crumbles to ash, and the attack deals only normal damage

Ash Form.name: Ash Form
Ash Form.description:
The ash skeleton crumbles to ash or reforms in a standing position. While ash, the ash skeleton is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobile}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard}, and has an automatic result of 28 on Deception checks and DCs to pass as an inanimate pile of ash or layer of soot.

The ash skeleton can remain in this ash form indefinitely.

Aspis Ambush.name: Aspis Ambush
Aspis Ambush.description: When an Aspis Guard rolls initiative using Deception or Stealth, they can attempt to [[/act demoralize]] one creature as a free action.

Bully.name: Bully
Bully.description: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to the Aspis Guard.

Running Reload.name: Running Reload
Running Reload.description: The Aspis veteran guard Stride, Steps, or Sneaks, and then Interacts to reload

Hunt Prey.name: Hunt Prey
Hunt Prey.description: The Aspis veteran guard designates a single creature they can see and hear, or one they're Tracking, as their prey. The Aspis veteran guard gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} the prey and to Survival checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} the prey. This effect lasts until the Aspis veteran guard uses Hunt Prey again.

Precision Edge.name: Precision Edge
Precision Edge.description: The first time the Aspis veteran guard hits their hunted prey in a round, they deal an additional 1d8 precision damage.

Awakened Ball Python.name: Awakened Ball Python
Awakened Ball Python.publicNotes:
This nonvenomous snake's name comes from its tendency to curl into a ball when frightened, though most people know it for its hunting tactic of coiling around prey and crushing victims with its powerful muscles. Nonetheless, brave herpetologists sometimes keep ball pythons as pets。

Snakes come in an array of forms, from jungle-dwelling constrictors that wrap around their prey to venomous vipers with deadly bites. Regardless, all snakes consume their prey whole by unhinging their jaws and using powerful muscles to move the food down their throats and into their stomachs。

Tighten Coils.name: Tighten Coils
Tighten Coils.description:
Trigger A creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} by the ball python attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape}.

Effect The DC of the Escape check is increased by 2.

Wrap in Coils.name: Wrap in Coils
Wrap in Coils.description:
Requirements A Medium or smaller creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} in the ball python's jaws.

Effect The ball python moves the creature into its coils, freeing its jaws to make attacks, then uses Constrict against the creature. The ball python's coils can hold one creature.

Awakened Giant Chameleon.name: Awakened Giant Chameleon
Awakened Giant Chameleon.publicNotes: Giant chameleons are legendary for their ability to change their skin color in response to their surroundings. Their eyes are capable of peering in different directions independently, making them almost as difficult to sneak up on as they are to notice in the first place。

Tongue Grab.name: Tongue Grab
Tongue Grab.description: If the giant chameleon hits a creature with a tongue Strike, that creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by the giant chameleon. The target isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, but it can't move beyond the reach of the giant chameleon's tongue. A creature can sever the tongue with an attack that hits AC 15 and deals at least 4 slashing damage. Though this doesn't deal any damage to the giant chameleon, it prevents it from using its tongue Strike until it regrows its tongue, which takes a week.

Camouflage.name: Camouflage
Camouflage.description: The giant chameleon can change its coloration to match its surroundings. It doesn't need cover to attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} with a Stealth check.

Awakened Giant Frilled Lizard.name: Awakened Giant Frilled Lizard
Awakened Giant Frilled Lizard.publicNotes:
Found in warm and tropical forests and savannas, these immense lizards are a deadly threat to the unsuspecting traveler. When they aren't sleeping or stalking prey, giant frilled lizards bask in the sunlight for hours at a time. Explorers sometimes mistakenly think them related to dragons due to their large size, elaborate neck frills (which, when displayed in a show of aggression and dominance, can be mistaken for wings), and ferocious hissing vocalizations used to frighten away creatures too large to eat。

A giant frilled lizard's primary food sources are oversized arthropods and other invertebrates, but it won't hesitate to augment its diet with vertebrates, including other lizards, monkeys, and just about anything it can fit into its mouth-even humanoids. Although capable of short bursts of speed, a giant frilled lizard normally lies perfectly still while hunting, hoping to ambush its prey。

Lizards have a wide range of appearances and abilities, but most share a basic reptilian shape-long tails, wide toothy mouths, and four legs. While a few species are capable of movement on two legs for short periods of time, most are strictly quadrupedal. The three species presented here represent the most common and well-known of the larger species。

Intimidating Display.name: Intimidating Display
Intimidating Display.description:
The giant frilled lizard Strides. If it ends that Stride adjacent to at least one other creature, it suddenly displays its colorful neck frills and issues a frightening hiss. Each adjacent creature must succeed at a @Check[will|dc:21] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3} on a critical failure).

The creature is then temporarily immune to Intimidating Display for 1 minute.

Awakened Megalania.name: Awakened Megalania
Awakened Megalania.publicNotes: Megalanias, like their smaller cousins the giant monitor lizards, strike fast and use their powerful bite to grip their prey. They prefer to swallow their prey whole rather than risk others getting a bite of a hard-won meal。

Megalania Venom.name: Megalania Venom
Megalania Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:25]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[1d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 3}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} (1 round)

equipment-Lance.name: Lance
equipment-Lance.description: This spear-like weapon is used by a mounted creature to deal a great deal of damage.

Bloodletting.description: When the sea devil deals piercing or slashing damage, it also deals @Damage[1d4[bleed]] if the target was @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} or if the attack was a critical hit.

equipment-Spear.name: Spear
equipment-Spear.description: A long metal shaft ending with a metal spike, a spear can be used one-handed as a melee weapon and can be thrown.

Shark Commune 150 feet.name: Shark Commune 150 feet
Shark Commune 150 feet.description: The sea devil can communicate telepathically with sharks within range. It can communicate only simple concepts like "come," "guard," or "attack."

Blood Frenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
Blood Frenzy.description:
Requirements The sea devil is not @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} or already in a frenzy

Trigger The sea devil deals bleed damage to a living creature.

Effect The sea devil flies into a frenzy that lasts 1 minute. While frenzied, the sea devil gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with its claws and jaws, gains a +4 status bonus to damage rolls with its claws and jaws, gains 11 temporary HP until the end of the frenzy, and takes a -2 status penalty to AC. The sea devil can't voluntarily stop its frenzy. After its frenzy, the sea devil is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}.

Shark Commune 150 feet.description: The sea devil can communicate telepathically with sharks within range. It can communicate only simple concepts like "come," "guard," or "attack."

Hateful Tide.name: Hateful Tide
Hateful Tide.description:
Requirements The sea devil baron is in a blood frenzy.

Effect The sea devil baron unleashes a whirlwind of attacks against its foes, making a single melee Strike with its claws or jaws against each opponent within reach.

Virtue Aversion.name: Virtue Aversion
Virtue Aversion.description: The quasit's link to a mortal soul gave it birth, but it presents a vulnerability. Once per round, a creature can present an object related to something virtuous or good in the life of the quasit's creator (such as a beloved daughter's doll) as an Interact action to automatically deal the quasit @Damage[2d6[mental]] damage.

      • Speed 15 feet, fly 30 feet

      • Senses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.rqfnQ5VHT5hxm25r]{Scent} (Imprecise) 30 feet
      • Speed 5 feet
      • Melee jaws [[/r 1d20+10 #Jaws]]{+10}/[[/r 1d20+5#Jaws]]{+5}/[[/r 1d20 #Jaws]]{+0}, Damage @Damage[2[bludgeoning]] damage
    • Wolf
      • Size Medium
      • Senses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.rqfnQ5VHT5hxm25r]{Scent} (Imprecise) 30 feet
      • Speed 40 feet, climb 10 feet
      • Melee jaws [[/r 1d20+10 #Jaws]]{+10}/[[/r 1d20+5 #Jaws]]{+5}/[[/r 1d20 #Jaws]]{+0}, Damage @Damage[2d6[piercing]] damage plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.BCLvAx4Pz4MLa2pu]{Knockdown}

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Abyssal Knowledge.name: Abyssal Knowledge
Abyssal Knowledge.description: When a quasit offers Aid for an Arcana or Religion check, it gets the critical success result on any success and gets the critical failure result on any failure.

Abyssal Healing.name: Abyssal Healing
Abyssal Healing.description:
Frequency once per round

Effect The quasit restores @Damage[1d6[healing]] Hit Points to itself.

Barrow Quasit Venom.name: Barrow Quasit Venom
Barrow Quasit Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:20|traits:damaging-effect]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} (1 round).

Blightburst.name: Blightburst
Blightburst.description: When a blighted fungus leshy dies, a burst of rotted compost explodes from its body, dealing @Damage[3d6[slashing],1d6[poison]|options:area-damage]{3d6 slashing damage and 1d6 poison damage} to each creature in a @Template[emanation|distance:30]. This area then fills with blighted fungi, becoming difficult terrain until the fungi wither 24 hours later.

Change Shape.description:
The blighted fungus leshy transforms into a Small, sickly-looking giant mushroom or patch of fungi. This ability otherwise uses the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.dileJ0Yxqg76LMvu]{One with Plants}.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]
Change Shape.name: Change Shape

Spore Cloud.name: Spore Cloud
Spore Cloud.description: A blighted fungus leshy can unleash a cloud of spores that irritates the eyes and throats of non-fungi creatures in a @Template[emanation|distance:15]. Each creature must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:18|options:area-effect,damaging-effect] save or take @Damage[2[persistent,poison]|options:area-damage] damage. On a failure, a creature has its vision range reduced to 20 feet (10 feet on a critical failure) as long as the persistent damage continues.

Spores.name: Spores
Spores.description: A creature damaged by a blighted fungus leshy's spore pod Strike must attempt a saving throw with the same DC and effect as its Spore Cloud ability.

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
The blighted leaf leshy transforms into a Small gnarled, rotted tree. This ability otherwise uses the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.dileJ0Yxqg76LMvu]{One with Plants}.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Blightburst.name: Blightburst
Blightburst.description: When a blighted leaf leshy dies, a burst of rotted compost explodes from its body, dealing @Damage[1d6[slashing],1d6[poison]|options:area-damage]{1d6 slashing damage and 1d6 poison damage} to each creature in a @Template[emanation|distance:30]. This area then fills with blighted saplings, becoming difficult terrain until the saplings wither 24 hours later.

Sickening Blow.name: Sickening Blow
Sickening Blow.description:
When a blighted leaf leshy hits with its seedpod Strike, the target must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:17] save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.

Blood Scent.name: Blood Scent
Blood Scent.description: The shark can smell blood in the water from up to 1 mile away.

Savage.description:
Requirements The shark hit with a jaws Strike on its most recent action this turn.

Effect The creature the shark hit takes @Damage[1d10[slashing]] damage
Savage.name: Savage

Breach.name: Breach
Breach.description: The shark Swims up to its swim Speed, then Leaps vertically out of the water up to 15 feet high, making a Strike against a creature at any point during the jump (this lets it attack a creature within 20 feet of the water's surface). After the Strike, the shark splashes back down into the water.

Bloody Vortex (3-4).name: Bloody Vortex (3-4)
Bloody Vortex (3-4).disable: Slay Silaqui, or @Check[thievery|dc:17|traits:action:disable-a-device] (受训) to pry the gem out of Silaqui followed by disrupting the gem's power by either breaking it (AC 15, Hardness 5, HP 25, BT 13) or using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (2nd level; counteract DC 15)
Bloody Vortex (3-4).routine:
All creatures within 40 feet of the vortex except Silaqui are drawn toward it. They must attempt either a @Check[fortitude|dc:14] save or an @Check[athletics|dc:14|traits:action:swim] check to Swim with a DC of 14, with the following results。

成功 The creature is not moved。

失败 The creature is moved 10 feet closer to the center of the vortex. If this causes the creature to reach the center square of the vortex, they are exposed to Consuming Maelstrom。

大失败 As failure, except the creature is moved 20 feet closer to the center of the vortex。

Invoke Curse.name: Invoke Curse
Invoke Curse.description:
Trigger Silaqui rolls initiative

Effect The ritual vortex begins to draw in nearby creatures. The trap rolls initiative.

Consuming Maelstrom.name: Consuming Maelstrom
Consuming Maelstrom.description:
A creature that is pulled into the center square of the vortex (or that chooses to enter it) must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:17] save.

Critical Success The creature is ejected safely to a square of their choice within 10 feet of the vortex.

Success The creature is ejected safely to a square adjacent to the vortex.

Failure The creature takes @Damage[(1d6+3)[electricity]] damage and is moved upward 40 feet.

Critical Failure As failure. Additionally, the creature is exposed the raw nature of the sea devil's frenzy and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 round (@Check[will|dc:17|traits:mental] negates). This is a mental effect.

Bloody Vortex (5-6).name: Bloody Vortex (5-6)
Bloody Vortex (5-6).disable: Slay Silaqui, or @Check[thievery|dc:20|traits:action:disable-a-device] (受训) to pry the gem out of Silaqui followed by disrupting the gem's power by either breaking it (AC 18, Hardness 10, HP 45, BT 23) or using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (2nd level; counteract DC 19)
Bloody Vortex (5-6).hazarddescription: A bloody vortex violently draining into a crack of raw elemental energy, fueled by the curse of a sea devil oracle。
Bloody Vortex (5-6).routine:
All creatures within 40 feet of the vortex except Silaqui are drawn toward it. They must attempt either a @Check[fortitude|dc:17] save or an @Check[athletics|dc:17|traits:action:swim] check to Swim with a DC of 17, with the following results。

成功 The creature is not moved。

失败 The creature is moved 10 feet closer to the center of the vortex. If this causes the creature to reach the center square of the vortex, they are exposed to Consuming Maelstrom。

大失败 As failure, except the creature is moved 20 feet closer to the center of the vortex。

Invoke Curse.name: Invoke Curse
Invoke Curse.description:
Trigger Silaqui rolls initiative

Effect The ritual vortex begins to draw in nearby creatures. The trap rolls initiative.

Consuming Maelstrom.name: Consuming Maelstrom
Consuming Maelstrom.description:
A creature that is pulled into the center square of the vortex (or that chooses to enter it) must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:20] save.

Critical Success The creature is ejected safely to a square of their choice within 10 feet of the vortex.

Success The creature is ejected safely to a square adjacent to the vortex.

Failure The creature takes @Damage[(1d10+6)[electricity]] damage and is moved upward 40 feet.

Critical Failure As failure. Additionally, the creature is exposed the raw nature of the sea devil's frenzy and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 round (@Check[will|dc:20|traits:mental] negates). This is a mental effect.

Boneshatter.name: Boneshatter
Boneshatter.description:
Trigger The ravener husk takes bludgeoning damage

Effect The ravener's brittle bones shatter, spraying bone shards everywhere. Every creature within a @Template[emanation|distance:10]{10-foot emanation} of the ravener husk takes @Damage[6d6[piercing]|options:area-damage] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:27|basic|options:area-effect] save).

Soulsense 60 feet.name: Soulsense 60 feet
Soulsense 60 feet.description: A ravener senses the spiritual essence of living and undead creatures within the listed range. Creatures whose material bodies are one unit with their souls, like celestials and fiends, appear brighter to this sense.

Breath Weapon.name: Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
The ravener husk breathes a torrent of void energy that deals @Damage[12d6[void]|options:area-damage] damage in a @Template[cone|distance:40] (@Check[reflex|dc:30|basic|options:area-effect] save).

They can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4 rounds}.

Brittle Skeletal Horse.name: Brittle Skeletal Horse
Brittle Skeletal Horse.publicNotes:
Skeletal horses are sometimes used as mounts by other undead or monsters。

Made from bones held together by foul necromancy, skeletons are among the most common types of undead, found haunting old dungeons and forgotten cemeteries。

Gallop.description: The horse Strides twice, with its Speed increased by 10 feet.
Gallop.name: Gallop

Undead Steed.name: Undead Steed
Undead Steed.description: Undead and creatures allied with them can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{Command} a skeletal steed without needing to attempt a skill check.

7Dwwk4c4cBxweZKc.name: 血液嗅觉 （模糊） 30 尺
7Dwwk4c4cBxweZKc.description: 曼德拉可以在30尺范围内以模糊地闻到有血液的生物，也可以在30尺范围内以精确地闻到有血液的恶魔、精类和术士。

Blood Drain.name: 吸血 Blood Drain
Blood Drain.description:
需求 曼德拉正在@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{受擒 Grabbed}一个生物；

效果 曼德拉从被擒抱的生物身上吸取血液，造成[[/r 2d6]]伤害。如果这个生物是恶魔、精类或术士，曼德拉将获得等同于造成伤害数值的临时生命值。

被曼德拉吸血的生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}，直到它受到任何形式的治疗。

Bruorsivi Sap Infusion.name: 血松树汁 Bruorsivi Sap Infusion
Bruorsivi Sap Infusion.description:
豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:19]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @Damage[1d6[fire]]伤害和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1}（1轮）

阶段2 @Damage[1d6[fire]]伤害和呆滞1（1轮）

阶段3 @Damage[2d6[fire]]伤害和呆滞1（1轮）

Piercing Shriek.name: 刺耳尖啸 Piercing Shriek
Piercing Shriek.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 曼德拉发出骇人的尖叫。30尺内的每个非曼德拉的生物必须尝试@Check[will|dc:23]豁免。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。

失败 生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}。

大失败 生物恶心2并@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。只要生物还处于惊惧状态，缓慢状态就不会被移除。

Blood Scent (Imprecise) 30 feet.description: A mandragora can smell creatures with blood as an imprecise sense at a range of 30 feet, and it can smell demons, fey, and sorcerers with blood as a precise sense at a range of 30 feet.
Blood Scent (Imprecise) 30 feet.name: Blood Scent (Imprecise) 30 feet

Burning Grasp.name: Burning Grasp
Burning Grasp.description: When the burned-out efreeti Grabs a creature, that creature takes @Damage[1d6[fire]] damage, then takes 1d6 fire damage at the end of each of its turns as long as it remains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}.

Combat Grab.description:
Requirements The burned-out efreeti has one hand free

Effect The burned-out efreeti makes a melee Strike while keeping one hand free. If the Strike hits, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} in the efreeti's free hand.
Combat Grab.name: Combat Grab

Chaotic Door (1-2).name: Chaotic Door (1-2)
Chaotic Door (1-2).disable: @Check[athletics|dc:17|name:Hold the Door Shut|traits:chaotic,hazard,magical,trap] (受训) to hold the door shut against the force, or @Check[thievery|dc:18|name:Relieve Door Pressure|traits:chaotic,hazard,magical,trap] (受训) to deftly relieve pressure from the door。
Chaotic Door (1-2).hazarddescription: The frame splinters as the door flings open, the force hitting those nearby。

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description:
触发 A creature touches any part of the door。

效果 The door flies open with incredible force. The triggering creature must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:17|traits:damaging-effect,chaotic,hazard,trap,magical] save as the door explodes outward into them, which deals @Damage[3d8[bludgeoning]] damage。

大成功 生物不受伤害。

成功 The creature takes half damage。

失败 The creature takes full damage and is knocked 10 feet toward the window behind them。

大失败 The creature takes full damage and is knocked 20 feet toward the window. The window shatters and the PC falls 5 feet before colliding with the ground, taking an additional @Damage[1d6[piercing]] damage from passing through the broken glass。

Chaotic Door (3-4).name: Chaotic Door (3-4)
Chaotic Door (3-4).disable: @Check[athletics|dc:20|name:Hold the Door Shut|traits:chaotic,hazard,magical,trap] (受训) to hold the door shut against the force, or @Check[thievery|dc:21|name:Relieve Door Pressure|traits:chaotic,hazard,magical,trap] (受训) to deftly relieve pressure from the door。
Chaotic Door (3-4).hazarddescription: The frame splinters as the door flings open, the force hitting those nearby。

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description:
触发 A creature touches any part of the door。

效果 The door flies open with incredible force. The triggering creature must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:22|traits:damaging-effect,chaotic,hazard,trap,magical] save as the door explodes outward into them, which deals @Damage[5d8[bludgeoning]] damage。

大成功 生物不受伤害。

成功 The creature takes half damage。

失败 The creature takes full damage and is knocked 10 feet toward the window behind them。

大失败 The creature takes full damage and is knocked 20 feet toward the window. The window shatters and the PC falls 5 feet before colliding with the ground, taking an additional @Damage[2d6[piercing]] damage from passing through the broken glass。

Scuttle.name: Scuttle
Scuttle.description:
Trigger A creature that the giant crab can see targets the crab with an attack

Effect The giant crab scuttles to the side and gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. After the attack resolves, the crab can Stride up to its speed in a straight line as part of the reaction.

Vulnerable to Prone.name: Vulnerable to Prone
Vulnerable to Prone.description: If a creature critically succeeds at a check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} the giant crab, the crab is flipped over onto its back in addition to the usual effects. A giant crab flipped onto its back has a particularly hard time defending itself; instead of taking the normal -2 circumstance penalty to AC for being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard}, it takes a -4 circumstance penalty to AC.

Chesjilawa Jadwiga Karina (5-6).name: 切西拉娃·雅德维嘉·卡里娜 Chesjilawa Jadwiga Karina (5-6)

equipment-Stone Knife.name: 石刀 Stone Knife
equipment-Stone Knife.description: 这种小型有刃的武器可以单手持握并在近战中刺伤生物。也可以用来投掷。

Winter Wise.name: 寒冬智慧 Winter Wise
Winter Wise.description: 切西拉娃通常能看穿薄雾、雾气和各种形式的降水。她忽视此类影响所造成的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。她忽略冰雪造成的困难和高等困难地形，在穿越这些地形时不会摔倒。

Mirrorshard Spell.name: 镜片法术 Mirrorshard Spell
Mirrorshard Spell.description: 当切西拉娃将她的魔法转变为一个更具物理性的形态来更好地伤害能抵抗寒冷的生物时，一面冰镜会在她的手或魔杖附近成型。如果她的下一个行动是释放一个造成寒冷伤害的法术，这面镜子会粉碎成冰片，将法术的一半伤害从寒冷转变为挥砍。

Snow Step.name: 冰雪步 Snow Step
Snow Step.description:
冰花在切西拉娃附近盛开，卷起一片暴雪，将她传送到120尺内一处她能看到的，有冰雪的位置。

之后的[[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内她无法使用冰雪步。

Chesjilawa Jadwiga Karina (7-8).name: 切西拉娃·雅德维嘉·卡里娜 Chesjilawa Jadwiga Karina (7-8)

equipment-+1 Striking Stone Knife.name: +1强击石刀 Stone Knife
equipment-+1 Striking Stone Knife.description: 这种小型有刃的武器可以单手持握并在近战中刺伤生物。也可以用来投掷。

Winter Wise.name: 寒冬智慧 Winter Wise
Winter Wise.description: 切西拉娃通常能看穿薄雾、雾气和各种形式的降水。她忽视此类影响所造成的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。她忽略冰雪造成的困难和高等困难地形，在穿越这些地形时不会摔倒。

Mirrorshard Spell.name: 镜片法术 Mirrorshard Spell
Mirrorshard Spell.description: 当切西拉娃将她的魔法转变为一个更具物理性的形态来更好地伤害能抵抗寒冷的生物时，一面冰镜会在她的手或魔杖附近成型。如果她的下一个行动是释放一个造成寒冷伤害的法术，这面镜子会粉碎成冰片，将法术的一半伤害从寒冷转变为挥砍。

Snow Step.name: 冰雪步 Snow Step
Snow Step.description:
冰花在切西拉娃附近盛开，卷起一片暴雪，将她传送到120尺内一处她能看到的，有冰雪的位置。

之后的[[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内她无法使用冰雪步。

Churning Lava (1-2).name: 翻腾岩浆 Churning Lava (1-2)
Churning Lava (1-2).disable: @Check[nature|dc:14|name:Clear mold|traits:uncommon,complex,environmental,fire]或@Check[survival|dc:14|name:Clear mold|traits:uncommon,complex,environmental,fire]或@Check[thievery|dc:17|name:Clear mold|traits:uncommon,complex,environmental,fire]清除你所在位置和所有触及范围内的霉菌。飞溅的岩浆不会伤害到处于没有霉菌的区域内的生物，但只有清除所有霉菌才能解除危害。
Churning Lava (1-2).hazarddescription: 褐色霉菌和熔岩之间的平衡被扰乱，熔岩中冒出气泡，不断爆裂并飞溅出火花。
Churning Lava (1-2).reset: 如果没有完全破坏，霉菌每天会扩散到离熔岩10尺范围内的一个方格，直到它完全再生并恢复平衡状态。如果所有的霉菌都被清除，危害就被破坏了。
Churning Lava (1-2).routine: (1动作) 对区域内随机一个生物使用熔岩飞溅攻击。

Boil.name: 沸腾 Boil
Boil.value:
触发 一个生物弄乱了霉菌，通常是由于走过它；

效果 危害对触发生物进行飞溅攻击，同时熔岩开始冒泡并骰先攻。
Boil.description:
Trigger A creature disturbs the mold, typically by walking through it

Effect The hazard makes a spatter attack against the triggering creature, and then rolls initiative as the lava begins to bubble.

Solidifying Lava.name: 凝固岩浆 Solidifying Lava
Solidifying Lava.value:
目标必须尝试@Check[fortitude|dc:17|name:Solidfying Lava|traits:uncommon,complex,enviornmental,fire]豁免，以避开迅速冷却凝固的岩浆。岩浆重击时，目标豁免结果的成功度下降一级：

成功 岩浆从目标身上滑下，没有额外效果。

失败 目标@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}。目标或与其相邻的生物可以用一个交互动作移除岩浆凝固成的石头，从而解除这个状态。

大失败 如失败，但目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}。每个交互动作可以将该状态的程度降低1。
Solidifying Lava.description:
The target must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:17] save as the lava rapidly cools and solidifies. On a critical hit, use the outcome for one degree of success worse than the result of the save.

Success The lava slides off the target with no additional effect.

Failure The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}. The target or an adjacent creature can take an Interact action to remove the stone, removing the condition.

Critical Failure As failure, except the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2}. Each Interact action to remove the stone reduces the value of the clumsy condition by 1.

Churning Lava (3-4).name: 翻腾岩浆 Churning Lava (3-4)
Churning Lava (3-4).disable: @Check[nature|dc:17|name:Clear mold|traits:uncommon,complex,environmental,fire]或@Check[survival|dc:17|name:Clear mold|traits:uncommon,complex,environmental,fire]或@Check[thievery|dc:20|name:Clear mold|traits:uncommon,complex,environmental,fire]清除你所在位置和所有触及范围内的霉菌。飞溅的岩浆不会伤害到处于没有霉菌的区域内的生物，但只有清除所有霉菌才能解除危害。
Churning Lava (3-4).hazarddescription: 褐色霉菌和熔岩之间的平衡被扰乱，熔岩中冒出气泡，不断爆裂并飞溅出火花。
Churning Lava (3-4).reset: 如果没有完全破坏，霉菌每天会扩散到离熔岩10尺范围内的一个方格，直到它完全再生并恢复平衡状态。如果所有的霉菌都被清除，危害就被破坏了。
Churning Lava (3-4).routine: (1动作) 对区域内随机一个生物使用熔岩飞溅攻击。

Boil.name: 沸腾 Boil
Boil.value:
触发 一个生物弄乱了霉菌，通常是由于走过它；

效果 危害对触发生物进行飞溅攻击，同时熔岩开始冒泡并骰先攻。
Boil.description:
Trigger A creature disturbs the mold, typically by walking through it

Effect The hazard makes a spatter attack against the triggering creature, and then rolls initiative as the lava begins to bubble.

Solidifying Lava.name: 凝固岩浆 Solidifying Lava
Solidifying Lava.value:
目标必须尝试@Check[fortitude|dc:20|name:Solidfying Lava|traits:uncommon,complex,enviornmental,fire]豁免，以避开迅速冷却凝固的岩浆。岩浆重击时，目标豁免结果的成功度下降一级：

成功 岩浆从目标身上滑下，没有额外效果。

失败 目标@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}。目标或与其相邻的生物可以用一个交互动作移除岩浆凝固成的石头，从而解除这个状态。

大失败 如失败，但目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}。每个交互动作可以将该状态的程度降低1。
Solidifying Lava.description:
The target must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:20] save as the lava rapidly cools and solidifies. On a critical hit, use the outcome for one degree of success worse than the result of the save.

Success The lava slides off the target with no additional effect.

Failure The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}. The target or an adjacent creature can take an Interact action to remove the stone, removing the condition.

Critical Failure As failure, except the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2}. Each Interact action to remove the stone reduces the value of the clumsy condition by 1.

Clouded Quartz (5-6).name: Clouded Quartz (5-6)
Clouded Quartz (5-6).publicNotes:
Insatiable scavengers stalking the eternal gloom of the Darklands, cavern trolls consume all in their path-even rocks and minerals when more nourishing sustenance is scarce. These rocky goliaths can tunnel through stone with their iron-sharp claws。

Cavern trolls rarely venture to the surface world, for they have a debilitating vulnerability to sunlight that petrifies them on sustained contact. Unlike common trolls, cavern trolls can regenerate wounds dealt by fire. The crystalline nature of their skin, however, permits sonic attacks to neutralize their signature regeneration。

As cavern trolls age, their flinty skin becomes studded with small crystals and stones of various composition. Paragons of their kind have toothy maws replete with large, crystalline fangs. A typical cavern troll stands 14 feet in height and weighs about 2,000 pounds。

Perpetual Storm Aura.name: Perpetual Storm Aura
Perpetual Storm Aura.description: 10 feet. Clouded Quartz is surrounded by a perpetual storm. The whirling winds impose a -2 circumstance penalty on ranged attack rolls using physical ammunition that target her or originate from her.

Tempest Sight.name: Tempest Sight
Tempest Sight.description: Clouded Quartz can see perfectly through wind and water. She never takes penalties to Perception from wind, rain, fog, or other precipitation, or from looking through water or being underwater, and such conditions don't cause anything to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from her.

Sunlight Petrification.name: Sunlight Petrification
Sunlight Petrification.description: If exposed to direct sunlight, Clouded Quartz immediately becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} and can't use reactions or Trample. The slowed value increases by 1 each time she ends her turn in sunlight. If Clouded Quartz's actions are reduced to 0 in this way, she becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{Petrified} until she spends at least 1 minute in darkness. Spells like @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.a3aQxCpoj1q1NQxC]{Sunburst} that create magical sunlight cannot petrify Clouded Quartz, but she's slowed 1 for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds} after being exposed to such an effect.

Rock Tunneler.name: Rock Tunneler
Rock Tunneler.description: Clouded Quartz can burrow through solid stone at a Speed of 10 feet. She can leave a tunnel if she desires.

Clouded Quartz (7-8).name: Clouded Quartz (7-8)
Clouded Quartz (7-8).publicNotes:

She never takes penalties to Perception from wind, rain, fog, or other precipitation, or from looking through water or being underwater, and such conditions don't cause anything to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from her.

Sunlight Petrification.description: If exposed to direct sunlight, Clouded Quartz immediately becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} and can't use reactions or Trample. The slowed value increases by 1 each time she ends her turn in sunlight. If Clouded Quartz's actions are reduced to 0 in this way, she becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{Petrified} until she spends at least 1 minute in darkness. Spells like @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.a3aQxCpoj1q1NQxC]{Sunburst} that create magical sunlight cannot petrify Clouded Quartz, but she is slowed 1 for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds} after being exposed to such an effect.

Rock Tunneler.name: Rock Tunneler
Rock Tunneler.description: Clouded Quartz can burrow through solid stone at a Speed of 10 feet. She can leave a tunnel if she desires.

Cobbleswarm (B5).name: Cobbleswarm (B5)
Cobbleswarm (B5).publicNotes:
Cobble mites resemble squarish stones a few inches across with mouths like split geodes. Though indolent and harmless alone, they're dangerous in large groups。

Busy road builders might unknowingly use cobble mites in construction。

Grasping Bites.name: Grasping Bites
Grasping Bites.description:
The cobbleswarm attempts an @Check[athletics] check and compares the result to the Fortitude DC of each creature in its space. This counts as two attacks for the cobbleswarm's multiple attack penalty.

Critical Success The creature falls prone, takes @Damage[1d6[bludgeoning]] damage, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by the cobbleswarm until the end of the cobbleswarm's next turn.

Success The creature falls prone.

Pummeling Assault.name: Pummeling Assault
Pummeling Assault.description: Each foe in the cobbleswarm's space takes @Damage[2d4[bludgeoning]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:17|basic] save).

Tremorsense (Precise) 40 feet, (Imprecis.name: Tremorsense (Precise) 40 feet, (Imprecise) 80 feet
Tremorsense (Precise) 40 feet, (Imprecis.description: A cobbleswarm's tremorsense is a precise sense out to 40 feet and an imprecise sense out to 80 feet. A cobbleswarm can't sense anything beyond the range of its tremorsense.

Collapsing Cabinet (1-2).name: 倒塌的柜子 Collapsing Cabinet (1-2)
Collapsing Cabinet (1-2).disable: @Check[thievery|dc:15|name:Support Cabinet|traits:mechanical,trap] (受训)将支撑物轻轻撑在柜子下面。
Collapsing Cabinet (1-2).hazarddescription:
从烧杯中泄漏出来的液体腐蚀了橱柜的支架。

此陷阱的BT是5，不是10。

Slam Down.name: 猛烈倾倒 Slam Down
Slam Down.description:
触发 有人触摸或者以其他方式和橱柜交互；

效果 橱柜倒塌，并且在受到冲击时碎裂。如果有人试图打破橱柜，但没有一次就击穿橱柜的破损阈值，橱柜也会倾倒。它对下方的生物造成@Damage[3d8[bludgeoning]] (@Check[reflex|dc:20|basic|traits:mechanical,trap]豁免)。

Collapsing Cabinet (3-4).name: 倒塌的柜子 Collapsing Cabinet (3-4)
Collapsing Cabinet (3-4).disable: @Check[thievery|dc:18|name:Support Cabinet|traits:mechanical,trap] (受训)将支撑物轻轻撑在柜子下面。
Collapsing Cabinet (3-4).hazarddescription:
从烧杯中泄漏出来的液体腐蚀了橱柜的支架。

此陷阱的BT是10，不是20。

Slam Down.name: 猛烈倾倒 Slam Down
Slam Down.description:
触发 有人触摸或者以其他方式和橱柜交互；

效果 橱柜倒塌，并且在受到冲击时碎裂。如果有人试图打破橱柜，但没有一次就击穿橱柜的破损阈值，橱柜也会倾倒。它对下方的生物造成@Damage[6d8[bludgeoning]] (@Check[reflex|dc:23|basic|traits:mechanical,trap]豁免)。

Collapsing Ice.name: Collapsing Ice
Collapsing Ice.disable: 2 @Check[crafting|dc:19|name:Create Ice Brace|traits:enviornmental] to create a makeshift device to brace the ice。
Collapsing Ice.hazarddescription: The ice here is weak and collapses under the weight of a Small or larger creature。

Collapse.name: Collapse
Collapse.description:
Trigger A creature follows the false trail onto thin ice

Effect The ice collapses beneath the lead dog sled team. The dogs and sled can be rescued, but the PCs lose significant time.

Collapsing Ramp (7-8).name: Collapsing Ramp (7-8)
Collapsing Ramp (7-8).disable: @Check[crafting|dc:28] (专家) to stabilize the masonry. Each attempt takes 2 actions。
Collapsing Ramp (7-8).hazarddescription: Abyssal fire hits the stone beneath the ramp, causing a 15-foot-long section of it to collapse。

Collapse.name: Collapse
Collapse.description:
Trigger A creature walks onto the collapse site

Effect The triggering creature falls off the Colossus and lands on the ground, taking @Damage[40[bludgeoning]|options:fall-damage] damage. They can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3yoajuKjwHZ9ApUY]{Grab an Edge} reaction to avoid falling (@Check[reflex|dc:22] save).

Collapsing Ramp (9-10).name: Collapsing Ramp (9-10)
Collapsing Ramp (9-10).disable: @Check[crafting|dc:31] (专家) to stabilize the masonry. Each attempt takes 2 actions。
Collapsing Ramp (9-10).hazarddescription: Abyssal fire hits the stone beneath the ramp, causing a 15-foot-long section of it to collapse。

Collapse.name: Collapse
Collapse.description:
Trigger A creature walks onto the collapse site

Effect The triggering creature falls off the Colossus and lands on the ground, taking @Damage[50[bludgeoning]|options:fall-damage] damage. They can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3yoajuKjwHZ9ApUY]{Grab an Edge} reaction to avoid falling (@Check[reflex|dc:24] save).

Commoner (PFS 2-13).name: Commoner (PFS 2-13)
Commoner (PFS 2-13).publicNotes:
Though not every commoner is downtrodden, many live hard lives of toil as they work to keep their families fed and housed in relative comfort. While many commoners are just simple folks who keep to themselves, sometimes commoners rebel, either rising up to face their oppressors or persuaded or even duped into joining nefarious plans and criminal conspiracies. Commoners benefit from power in numbers, and a crowd of commoners can accomplish a great deal more than their rulers often expect。

Unfortunately, every society has people living on its fringes. While good communities work to grant aid and respite to their downtrodden, sometimes-due to economic downturn, famine, or war-the ranks of the less fortunate exceed the community's capacity to support them. In heartless neutral and evil societies, poverty is seen as an inevitability that can never be truly eradicated, or even worse, as a tool to be manipulated for political gain。

Power of the Mob.name: Power of the Mob
Power of the Mob.description: When three or more commoners are adjacent to each other each commoner gets a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, attack rolls, and damage rolls.

Smoke Vision.name: Smoke Vision
Smoke Vision.description: The corrupted wildfire ignores the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition from smoke.

Filthy Burn.name: Filthy Burn
Filthy Burn.description: When the corrupted wildfire successfully strikes a creature with an attack that deals persistent fire damage, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} on a critical hit). This condition cannot be reduced below 1 while the creature is subject to the persistent fire damage from the attack, and ends automatically when the persistent fire ends.

Acrid Cloud.name: Acrid Cloud
Acrid Cloud.description:
The burning sap that makes up the corrupted wildfire's body sputters and pops, ejecting a cloud of acrid that smoke in a @Template[emanation|distance:10] that lasts for 1 round.

This smoke provides concealment to all creatures within, and deals @Damage[1d6[poison]|options:area-damage] damage to any creature that enters or begins its turn in the cloud (@Check[fortitude|dc:20|basic|options:area-effect]).

A creature that fails is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} on a critical failure).

Smoke Vision.name: Smoke Vision
Smoke Vision.description: The corrupted wildfire ignores the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition from smoke.

Acrid Cloud.name: Acrid Cloud
Acrid Cloud.description:
The burning sap that makes up the corrupted wildfire's body sputters and pops, ejecting a cloud of acrid that smoke in a @Template[emanation|distance:10] that lasts for 1 round.

This smoke provides concealment to all creatures within, and deals @Damage[2d4[poison]|options:area-damage] damage to any creature that enters or begins its turn in the cloud (@Check[fortitude|dc:22|basic|options:area-effect]).

A creature that fails is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} on a critical failure).

Filthy Burn.name: Filthy Burn
Filthy Burn.description: When the corrupted wildfire successfully strikes a creature with an attack that deals persistent fire damage, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} on a critical hit). This condition cannot be reduced below 1 while the creature is subject to the persistent fire damage from the attack, and ends automatically when the persistent fire ends.

I Wish You Hadn't Done That.name: I Wish You Hadn't Done That
I Wish You Hadn't Done That.description:
Trigger A creature would hit Corvius with an attack roll, or Corvius would fail a saving throw

Frequency one use

Effect The effects of a past wish warp reality in Corvius's favor. If used on a successful attack roll, the attack roll instead critically misses. If used on Corvius's saving throw, Corvius instead critically succeeds at the saving throw.

I Wish You Hadn't Done That.name: I Wish You Hadn't Done That
I Wish You Hadn't Done That.description:
Trigger A creature would hit Corvius with an attack roll, or Corvius would fail a saving throw

Frequency one use

Effect The effects of a past wish warp reality in Corvius's favor. If used on a successful attack roll, the attack roll instead critically misses. If used on Corvius's saving throw, Corvius instead critically succeeds at the saving throw.

Soulsense 60 feet.name: Soulsense 60 feet
Soulsense 60 feet.description: A ravener senses the spiritual essence of living and undead creatures within the listed range. Creatures whose material bodies are one unit with their souls, like celestials and fiends, appear brighter to this sense.

Boneshatter.name: Boneshatter
Boneshatter.description:
Trigger The ravener husk takes bludgeoning damage

Effect The ravener's brittle bones shatter, spraying bone shards everywhere. Every creature within a @Template[emanation|distance:10] of the ravener husk takes @Damage[5d6[piercing]|options:area-damage] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:25|basic|options:area-effect] save).

Breath Weapon.name: Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
The ravener husk breathes a torrent of void energy that deals @Damage[11d6[void]|options:area-damage] damage in a @Template[cone|distance:40] (@Check[reflex|dc:28|basic|options:area-effect] save).

They can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4 rounds}.

Flash of Insight.name: Flash of Insight
Flash of Insight.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger The cyclops bodak is about to roll a d20

Effect The bodak peers into an occluded spectrum of all possible futures. It gets a success (but not a critical success) on the roll instead of rolling.

Sunlight Vulnerability.name: Sunlight Vulnerability
Sunlight Vulnerability.description: If exposed to direct sunlight, the cyclops bodak can't use actions with the death trait and it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}. The slowed value increases by 1 each time the cyclops bodak ends its turn in sunlight. If the bodak loses all its actions this way, it is destroyed.

Death Gaze.name: Death Gaze
Death Gaze.description:
The cyclops bodak stares at a living creature within 30 feet that it can sense with its @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.sebk9XseMCRkDqRg]{Lifesense}. That creature must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:25] save. If the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained}, the bodak gains a number of temporary Hit Points equal to 5 times the value of the drained condition the target gained.

Multiple exposures to this ability can increase a creature's drained condition to a maximum of 4. If the cyclops bodak is destroyed, any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed} condition a creature has gained from Death Gaze are removed.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2}.

Critical Failure The creature is doomed 1 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 4}.

Bodak Spawn.name: Bodak Spawn
Bodak Spawn.description: Any humanoid who dies while @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed} by a cyclops bodak rises as an autonomous @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.Actor.jCJUvzs1FaL6PAkq]{Bodak} 24 hours after its death.

Daughter Of Cocytus Enforcer.name: Daughter Of Cocytus Enforcer

Deny Advantage.description: The Daughter Of Cocytus Enforcer isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to creatures of 4th level or lower that are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}, flanking, or using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.w6rMqmGzhUahdnA7]{Surprise Attack}.
Deny Advantage.name: Deny Advantage

Nimble Dodge.name: Nimble Dodge
Nimble Dodge.description:
Trigger The Daughter Of Cocytus Enforcer is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker it can see.

Effect The Daughter Of Cocytus Enforcer gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

+1 Circumstance to All Saves vs. Traps.name: +1 Circumstance to All Saves vs. Traps

Mobility.name: Mobility
Mobility.description: When the Daughter Of Cocytus Enforcer Strides half their speed or less, that movement does not trigger reactions.

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: The Daughter Of Cocytus Enforcer deals 1d6 extra precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

Surprise Attack.name: Surprise Attack
Surprise Attack.description: On the first round of combat, if the Daughter Of Cocytus Enforcer rolls Deception or Stealth for initiative, creatures that haven't acted are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to them.

Daughter Of Cocytus Enforcer.allSaves: +1 circumstance to all saves vs. traps

Brutal Beating.name: Brutal Beating
Brutal Beating.description:
The Daughter of Cocytus grunt's brutality shakes foes' confidence.

When the Daughter of Cocytus grunt deals damage on a critical hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}, and the Daughter of Cocytus grunt can knock the target up to 10 feet away (this is forced movement).

Snagging Strike.name: Snagging Strike
Snagging Strike.description:
Trigger The Daughter of Cocytus grunt has one hand free, and its target is within reach of that hand.

Effect The Daughter of Cocytus grunt makes a melee Strike while keeping one hand free. If this Strike hits, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the start of the ruffian's next turn or until it leaves the Daughter of Cocytus grunt's reach, whichever comes first.

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: The Daughter of Cocytus grunt deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.
The Daughter of Cocytus tough deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.
Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack

Unrelenting Beating.name: Unrelenting Beating
Unrelenting Beating.description:
The Daughter of Cocytus tough's brutality shakes foes' confidence and may disorient them.

When the Daughter of Cocytus tough deals damage on a critical hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}, and it must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:20] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} until the end of the tough's next turn.

Gang Up.name: Gang Up
Gang Up.description: If the Daughter of Cocytus tough is within reach of an enemy, and that enemy is also within reach of at least two of her allies, that enemy is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against her attacks.

Favored Prey.name: Favored Prey
Favored Prey.description: A bulette gains a +1 circumstance bonus to attack and damage rolls with its jaws against a specific type of creature designated as its favorite food. Unless otherwise stated, a bulette's favored prey is halflings. Elves are never a favored prey for bulettes

Leaping Charge.name: Leaping Charge
Leaping Charge.description: The bulette attempts a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump}. If it's adjacent to an enemy at the apex of its High Jump or at the end of its Long Jump, it can make a claw Strike against the enemy at that moment. If the bulette jumps at least 5 feet vertically or at least 20 feet horizontally, it can attempt two claw Strikes instead of one. The bulette's multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until it has made all the claw Strikes that are part of its Leaping Charge.

Powerful Jumper.name: Powerful Jumper
Powerful Jumper.description: A bulette jumps 10 feet up on a successful @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump} or 20 feet up on a critical success.

Abyssal Spite.description: The spirit lashes out at a creature within 60 feet, dealing @Damage[(2d10+7)[mental]] damage (@Check[will|dc:28|basic] save).

Drain Life.name: Drain Life
Drain Life.description:
When the demoniac spirit damages a living creature with its spectral claw Strike, the spirit gains 10 temporary Hit Points and the target must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:28|options:inflicts:drained] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}. Further damage dealt by the spirit increases the drained condition value by 1 on a failed save, to a maximum of drained 4.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.LRIYUFQ7FE9H4RWD]{Effect: Drain Life}

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Vitality.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Vitality

Vengeful Flash.name: Vengeful Flash
Vengeful Flash.description:
Trigger A creature makes a successful melee attack against the spirit or makes a successful Acrobatics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through} the spirit's space

Effect The spirit emits a brief pulse of void energy that deals @Damage[5d6[void]] damage to the triggering creature (@Check[reflex|dc:26|basic] save).

Ritual Transformation.name: Ritual Transformation
Ritual Transformation.description: The spirit has been absorbing energy through the ritual so it can transform itself once Urxehl manifests. Once the total value of all of the drained conditions the spirit has inflicted with drain life reaches 3, it loses its incorporeal trait as its body becomes solid. The spirit loses all of its immunities and resistances, it gains 40 Temporary Hit Points, and its Strength bonus increases to +0.

Demonplague.name: Demonplague
Demonplague.description:
An infected creature can't cure conditions given by demonplague until it has been cured of the disease

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:21]

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (1 day)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} (1 day)

Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} and stupefied 2 (1 day)

Stage 4 Fatigued and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 3} (1 day)

Stage 5 dead, rising as a demonplague zombie immediately.

Slow.name: Slow
Slow.description: A zombie is permanently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} and can't use reactions.

Desiccated Giant Crawling Hand.name: 干燥的伏行之手 Desiccated Giant Crawling Hand

Pus Burst.name: 脓液爆发 Pus Burst
Pus Burst.description:
触发 伏行之手受到穿刺或挥砍伤害；

效果 一个与伏行之手相邻的生物被喷了一身恶臭的脓液，受到@Damage[2d6[void]]伤害。受影响的生物必须尝试@Check[reflex|dc:19|traits:damaging-effect]豁免。

大成功 生物不受伤害。

成功 生物受到一半伤害并@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。

失败 生物受到全部伤害并@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}。

大失败 生物受到双倍伤害并@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 3}。

Mark Quarry.name: 标记猎物 Mark Quarry
Mark Quarry.description: 伏行之手可以将猎物的血涂在手上以标记猎物。如果手目前没有指定猎物，那么它会自动标记下一个被它伤害的生物作为猎物。手在@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seeks}猎物的察觉检定，@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{追踪 Tracks}猎物的生存检定和打击时的伤害上获得+1环境加值。

Channel Firestorm.name: Channel Firestorm
Channel Firestorm.description: If the next action the Disciple of Urxehl takes is to Cast a Spell, any creature that has taken damage from Urxehl's firestorm since the Disciple's last turn takes a -2 circumstance penalty to AC and saves against the spell.

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Urxehl's Grace.name: Urxehl's Grace
Urxehl's Grace.description:
Trigger Urxehl's firestorm targets a creature

Effect The Disciple of Urxehl redirects the firestorm, causing it to target a different creature of the Disciple's choice.

Disciple of Urxehl (7-8).allSaves: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Flame-Scorched.name: Flame-Scorched
Flame-Scorched.description: If the forest rot takes fire damage, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} until the end of its turn.

Spores.name: Spores
Spores.description:
Trigger An adjacent creature damages the dragon forest rot.

Effect The dragon forest rot sprays spores on the triggering creature. The spores deal @Damage[(2d4+5)[piercing]] damage with a @Check[fortitude|dc:19|basic] save. On a critical failure, the triggering creature gains weakness to slashing 5 for the next 4 rounds.

Stench.name: Stench
Stench.description: 20 feet. A creature that enters or starts its turn in the emanation must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:19] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}. On a critical failure, the creature also takes a –5-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. While within the aura, the creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to saves to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune to the of all dragon forest rots for 1 minute.

Breath Weapon.name: Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
The dragon forest rot breathes a toxic cloud that deals @Damage[5d6[poison]|options:area-damage] damage in a @Template[cone|distance:15] (@Check[fortitude|dc:20|basic|options:area-effect] save).

It can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4 rounds}.

Dragon's Death (1-2).name: Dragon's Death (1-2)
Dragon's Death (1-2).disable: @Check[religion|dc:20|name:Exorcise the Spirit|traits:haunt] (受训) to exorcise the spirit (two actions), or @Check[diplomacy|dc:23|name:Calm the Spirit|traits:haunt] (受训) to calm the spirit momentarily (two actions)。
Dragon's Death (1-2).hazarddescription: The pile of bones transforms into a Large silver dragon, while the PCs appear to transform into dark, shadowy figures of alien physique. The dragon's flesh appears to slowly dissolve into lines of black smoke, which trail away toward the PCs and appear to be absorbed into their bodies. Once the dragon is stripped of flesh, its skeleton explodes in a shower of bone fragments。
Dragon's Death (1-2).reset: 1 minute, as the bone fragments slowly move back into a neat pile with the skull on top。
Dragon's Death (1-2).routine:
触发 A creature comes within 15 feet of the dragon skull

效果 All living creatures within 20 feet of the nest are peppered with bone shards and take @Damage[(2d10+7)[slashing]]伤害 (@Check[reflex|dc:20|basic|name:Dragon's Death|traits:haunt,divine,necromancy]豁免)。

Dragon's Death (3-4).name: Dragon's Death (3-4)

Once the dragon is stripped of flesh, its skeleton explodes in a shower of bone fragments。

Deny Advantage.description: Drandle Dreng isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to flanking, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} creatures of 8th-level or lower, or creatures of 8th-level or lower using surprise attack.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: When Drandle Dreng rolls a success on a Reflex save, they get a critical success instead.

Mobility.name: Mobility
Mobility.description: When Drandle Dreng Strides half his Speed or less, that movement doesn't trigger reactions.

Skirmish Strike.name: Skirmish Strike
Skirmish Strike.description: Drandle Dreng either Steps and then Strikes, or Strikes and then Steps.

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: Drandle Dreng deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

Tumble Behind.name: Tumble Behind
Tumble Behind.description: When Drandle Dreng successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumbles Through}, the foe whose space he passed through is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against the next attack he makes before the end of his turn.

Sidestep.name: Sidestep
Sidestep.description:
Trigger The attack roll for a Strike targeting Drandle Dreng fails or critically fails

Effect Drandle Dreng redirects the attack to a creature of his choice that is adjacent to him and within the reach of the triggering attack. The attacker rerolls the Strike's attack roll against the new target.

Surprise Attack.name: Surprise Attack
Surprise Attack.description: On the first round of combat, if Drandle Dreng rolls Deception or Stealth for initiative, creatures who haven't acted are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to him.

Sidestep.description:

Debilitating Strike.description:
Trigger Drandle Dreng's Strike hits an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creature and deals damage

Effect Drandle Dreng chooses one of the following debilitations for the target, which lasts until the end of his next turn:

  • it can't flank or contribute to allies' flanking,
  • it takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds,
  • or it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1}.

Drandlesticks (7-8).name: Drandlesticks (7-8)
Drandlesticks (7-8).hazarddescription: Enchanted caltrops blend in with the surrounding masonry。

Stick.name: Stick
Stick.description:
Trigger A creature walks on to the Drandlesticks

Effect The triggering creature must succeed at a @Check[acrobatics|dc:27] check or take @Damage[(1d4+7)[piercing],2d6[precision,piercing]]{1d4+7 piercing damage, 2d6 precision damage}, and @Damage[2d4[bleed]]. A creature taking persistent bleed damage from the Drandlesticks takes a –10-foot penalty to its Speed.

Additionally, a creature damaged by the Drandlesticks is targeted by a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aIHY2DArKFweIrpf]{Command} spell (@Check[will|dc:25|traits:magical,enchantment,mental] save) with orders to release everything it's holding; if the creature fails the save and drops what it's holding, there is a [[/r {1dc}#Heads(1): blown over the edge]]{50% chance} that the high winds blow the object or objects off the edge of the Colossus.

Drandlesticks (9-10).name: Drandlesticks (9-10)
Drandlesticks (9-10).hazarddescription: Enchanted caltrops blend in with the surrounding masonry。

Stick.name: Stick
Stick.description:
Trigger A creature walks on to the Drandlesticks

Effect The triggering creature must succeed at a @Check[acrobatics|dc:30] check or take @Damage[(1d4+11)[piercing],2d6[precision,piercing]]{1d4+11 piercing damage, 2d6 precision damage}, and @Damage[2d4[bleed]]. A creature taking persistent bleed damage from the Drandlesticks takes a –10-foot penalty to its Speed.

Additionally, a creature damaged by the Drandlesticks is targeted by a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aIHY2DArKFweIrpf]{Command} spell (@Check[will|dc:28|traits:magical,enchantment,mental] save) with orders to release everything it's holding; if the creature fails the save and drops what it's holding, there is a [[/r {1dc}#Heads(1): blown over the edge]]{50% chance} that the high winds blow the object or objects off the edge of the Colossus.

Swipe.name: Swipe
Swipe.description: The draugr makes a melee Strike and compares the attack roll result to the AC of up to two foes, each of whom must be within its melee reach and adjacent to each other. Roll damage only once and apply it to each creature hit. A counts as two attacks for the draugr's multiple attack penalty.

The Sea's Revenge.name: The Sea's Revenge
The Sea's Revenge.description: A creature that slays a draugr is subjected to a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.z2mfh3oPnfYqXflY]{Mariner's Curse} spell with a save DC of 20. The curse ends if the draugr is buried in a calm sea or after 1 week passes.

Grotesque Gift.name: Grotesque Gift
Grotesque Gift.description: A draugr's attacks spatter their targets with rancid flesh and rotting seaweed. A creature damaged by a draugr's Strike must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:18] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} on a critical failure).

Duergar Raider.name: 灰矮人劫掠者 Duergar Raider

Shackle.name: 枷锁 Shackle
Shackle.description:
需求 劫掠者持用镣铐，和目标生物相邻；

效果 劫掠者投掷攻击骰，用[[/r 1d20+8 #Shackle Attack]]{+8调整值}对抗目标生物的AC。成功时，目标手腕或脚踝被戴上镣铐。

+2 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: +2 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Duergar Raider.allSaves: +2 status to all saves vs. magic

Electric Lock Rune.name: Electric Lock Rune
Electric Lock Rune.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:20|name:Scratch Out the Rune] (专家) to scratch out the rune without allowing electricity to flow, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (2nd level; counteract DC 18) to counteract the rune
Electric Lock Rune.hazarddescription: An invisible rune imprinted on a chest's lock releases a powerful electrical discharge。

Electrocution.name: Electrocution
Electrocution.description:
Trigger A creature touches the lock directly or with a tool.

Effect The trap deals @Damage[3d12[electricity]] damage to the triggering creature (@Check[reflex|dc:22|basic] save).

Construct Armor (Hardness 5).name: Construct Armor (Hardness 5)
Construct Armor (Hardness 5).description:
Like normal objects, the anatomical model has Hardness. This Hardness reduces any damage the model takes by an amount equal to the Hardness.

Once an anatomical model is reduced to fewer than half its Hit Points, or immediately upon being damaged by a critical hit, its construct armor breaks, removing the Hardness and reducing its Armor Class to 19.

Slimy Guts.name: Slimy Guts
Slimy Guts.description: A creature hit by the anatomical model's guts attack is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until it takes an action to remove the guts. A creature critically hit by the anatomical model's guts attack is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes}.

Ember Fox (PFS 2-14).name: Ember Fox (PFS 2-14)
Ember Fox (PFS 2-14).publicNotes: Ember foxes resemble their canid namesakes, save for the flames that make their fur and the tips of their long whiskers flicker and glow。

Cloak in Embers.name: Cloak in Embers
Cloak in Embers.description:
Trigger An adjacent ally is targeted by an effect that deals fire damage

Effect The ember fox drapes itself across its ally, granting the ally fire resistance 10 against the incoming attack.

Empowered Blood (1-2).name: Empowered Blood (1-2)
Empowered Blood (1-2).disable: @Check[thievery|dc:18|name:Scratch Out Runes] (untrained) to scratch out enough runes to disrupt the magic or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (1st level; counteract DC 15) to counteract the runes。
Empowered Blood (1-2).hazarddescription: Glowing red Daemonic runes blaze when blood falls on them。
Empowered Blood (1-2).reset: The hazard resets at the beginning of each round until it is disabled

Siphon Blood.name: Siphon Blood
Siphon Blood.description:
Trigger A creature is reduced to 0 HP in the magic circle

Effect Sezruth (the aghash div in area C) gains 1 Blood Point.

Empowered Blood (3-4).name: Empowered Blood (3-4)
Empowered Blood (3-4).disable: @Check[thievery|dc:20|name:Scratch Out Runes] (untrained) to scratch out enough runes to disrupt the magic or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (1st level; counteract DC 15) to counteract the runes
